message:
An innovative healthcare technology Company is hiring a qualified caliber :

Title: Sr. Front-End Software 

Responsibilities:

Specialize in building groundbreaking web applications using advanced HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Contribute to presentation layer standards and practices
Contribute to testing and implementation approach for presentation layer
Prototype future interfaces
Work closely with our product and design teams, as well as other engineers.

Requirements:

BS or BA degree related to Software Engineering.
2+Experience in developing highly interactive Web applications with modular, reusable JavaScript
Exceptional object-oriented JavaScript skills
Interest if not experience working further down the stack

To apply please send C.v at (jobs@drbridge.com)
